content.raw:
Have you launched the simulation with `init:=true`? If not, I think you might need to switch to high-level control before being able to use the ihmc controllers:

~~~
rostopic pub -1 /ihmc_ros/valkyrie/control/low_level_control_mode ihmc_valkyrie_ros/ValkyrieLowLevelControlModeRosMessage '{requested_control_mode: 2, unique_id: -1}'
~~~

This is [line 11 in init_robot.sh](#!/osrf/srcsim/src/548915a94a4763edaad178991461284e11670ab9/scripts/init_robot.sh?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#init_robot.sh-11).
content.html:
Have you launched the simulation with init:=true? If not, I think you might need to switch to high-level control before being able to use the ihmc controllers:

rostopic pub -1 /ihmc_ros/valkyrie/control/low_level_control_mode ihmc_valkyrie_ros/ValkyrieLowLevelControlModeRosMessage '{requested_control_mode: 2, unique_id: -1}'

This is line 11 in init_robot.sh.
